IMMERSE YOURSELF

IMMERSE YOURSELF

Sunmar is at the heart of a booming city that in recent years has transposed itself from a sleepy mediterranean coastal port and tourist destination to a pulsating international hub for commerce and finance.

A perfect setting for luxury living in one of the most sought out areas of limassol. a combination of comfort and elegance, enabling you to enjoy the conveniences of modern living whilst at the same time offering you a beautifully landscaped space where you can live in harmony with nature.

Discover more

ENTRANCE

BUSINESS & PLEASURE

THE LOBBY

The classic, sophisticated design of the lobby generates positive feelings that leave a powerful impression. Here is a sociable, welcoming space where residents and visitors can gather together.

A key feature of this handsomely appointed work-live oriented area is the co-working zone – an informal sphere of functionality that actively encourages networking and interaction.

PROPERTY FACILITIES

resort style facilities

A perfect setting for luxury living in one of the most sought out areas of limassol. A combination of comfort and elegance, enabling you to enjoy the conveniences of modern living whilst at the same time offering you a beautifully landscaped space where you can live in harmony with nature.

PROPERTY AMENITIES

Five Star Amenities

Limassol’s finest coastal living experience is enriched by superb service, an abundance of amenities, and a dedicated concierge. Attentive staff deliver highly personalised hospitality to every resident. Sunmar is a place to play, to rest and to establish lasting memories.

Enjoy a glass of wine with friends, slip into the cooling waters of the sparkling pool or pamper yourself with a bespoke treatment in a luxurious, indulgent spa, sauna or turkish bath. The possibilities are endless at sunmar – set your imagination free.
